title: Rename :frida â†’ :frida-jvm, implement :frida-api interfaces
description: Rename the :frida module directory to :frida-jvm, update settings.gradle.kts, app/build.gradle.kts, and all cross-module references. Make FridaDevice, FridaSession, FridaScript implement the corresponding interfaces from :frida-api. Add :frida-api as a dependency of :frida-jvm. Remove duplicate model classes from :frida-jvm.

title: Add iOS Kotlin/Native Cinterop module :frida-ios
description: Create :frida-ios module using Kotlin/Native cinterop against frida_core.h / libfrida-core.a for iosArm64/iosSimulatorArm64. Implement IFridaDevice, IFridaSession, IFridaScript using cinterop-generated bindings. Use StableRef<T> for GObject signal callbacks. Modify download_frida_devkit.sh to accept OS=ios.
